content: About morero profile
title: morero's profile

content: 1. Who is morero?Hi, I’m Taisuke Okamoto. I’m a Software engineer living in Tokyo🗼. I’m mainly developing KaaS (Kuberentes As a Service). I like system optimization and network security.
title: morero's profile

content: 2. Inscription on the right“What is asked for is what is tested” I believe that there is an essence to things and that they feed us. I always keep a sense of purpose in my work. I always keep a sense of purpose in my work, because maybe that work will be useful to me in the future… I will never forget these words and spend my days with great care.
title: morero's profile
